       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Black Lives Matter
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="83a6c6da-dc51-430a-a8c3-498ec0c892b4" data-vars-block-slot="2" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item breonna-taylor-one-year-justice image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="1" href="/culture/career-politics/a35810879/breonna-taylor-one-year-justice/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/people-gather-at-breonna-taylors-make-shift-memorial-in-news-photo-1615484074.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.0801xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="breonna taylor mural" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/people-gather-at-breonna-taylors-make-shift-memorial-in-news-photo-1615484074.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.0801xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/people-gather-at-breonna-taylors-make-shift-memorial-in-news-photo-1615484074.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.0801xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/people-gather-at-breonna-taylors-make-shift-memorial-in-news-photo-1615484074.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.0801xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/people-gather-at-breonna-taylors-make-shift-memorial-in-news-photo-1615484074.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.0801xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/people-gather-at-breonna-taylors-make-shift-memorial-in-news-photo-1615484074.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.0801xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Breonna Taylor"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="1" href="/culture/career-politics/a35810879/breonna-taylor-one-year-justice/">
            How Do You Measure a Year?
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             Black women must be at the center of organizing, not only when there’s an election, but also when our bodies are on the line.
            </p>
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item ilyasah-shabazz-black-history-month-education image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="2" href="/culture/career-politics/a35636497/ilyasah-shabazz-black-history-month-education/">
           <img alt="ilyasah shabazz" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/unknown-3-1614291539.jpeg?crop=0.634xw:0.685xh;0.145xw,0.315xh&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/unknown-3-1614291539.jpeg?crop=0.634xw:0.685xh;0.145xw,0.315xh&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/unknown-3-1614291539.jpeg?crop=0.634xw:0.685xh;0.145xw,0.315xh&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/unknown-3-1614291539.jpeg?crop=0.634xw:0.685xh;0.145xw,0.315xh&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/unknown-3-1614291539.jpeg?crop=0.634xw:0.685xh;0.145xw,0.315xh&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="2" href="/culture/career-politics/a35636497/ilyasah-shabazz-black-history-month-education/">
            It's Time to Rewrite the History Books
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             Educator and activist Ilyasah Shabazz breaks down the necessary reforms.
            </p>
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item black-women-burnout-epidemic image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="3" href="/culture/books/a35696973/black-women-burnout-epidemic/">
           <img alt="black women burnout" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/burnout-1614702587.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/burnout-1614702587.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/burnout-1614702587.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/burnout-1614702587.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/burnout-1614702587.jpg?crop=0.5xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="3" href="/culture/books/a35696973/black-women-burnout-epidemic/">
            Black Women Are in the Midst of a Burnout Epidemic
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            Racial justice educator and author Rachel Ricketts on why society needs to reckon with the stress and trauma it inflicts on Black women…
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item america-redefined-2021 image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="4" href="/culture/career-politics/a34897275/america-redefined-2021/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/story-lead-v1f-1610467942.gif?crop=0.502xw:0.897xh;0.498xw,0.0712xh&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/story-lead-v1f-1610467942.gif?crop=0.502xw:0.897xh;0.498xw,0.0712xh&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/story-lead-v1f-1610467942.gif?crop=0.502xw:0.897xh;0.498xw,0.0712xh&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/story-lead-v1f-1610467942.gif?crop=0.502xw:0.897xh;0.498xw,0.0712xh&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/story-lead-v1f-1610467942.gif?crop=0.502xw:0.897xh;0.498xw,0.0712xh&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/story-lead-v1f-1610467942.gif?crop=0.502xw:0.897xh;0.498xw,0.0712xh&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Black Lives Matter" data-vars-position="4" href="/culture/career-politics/a34897275/america-redefined-2021/">
            America Redefined
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             As the pandemic stalked us and racial injustice awoke us, journalist Rita Omokha traveled the country, listening for unheard voices.
            </p>
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

            <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/billie-eilish-attends-the-92nd-annual-academy-awards-at-news-photo-1616006316.?crop=0.777xw:1.00xh;0.112xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
            </span>
            <img alt="92nd annual academy awards   arrivals" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/billie-eilish-attends-the-92nd-annual-academy-awards-at-news-photo-1616006316.?crop=0.777xw:1.00xh;0.112xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/billie-eilish-attends-the-92nd-annual-academy-awards-at-news-photo-1616006316.?crop=0.777xw:1.00xh;0.112xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/billie-eilish-attends-the-92nd-annual-academy-awards-at-news-photo-1616006316.?crop=0.777xw:1.00xh;0.112xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/billie-eilish-attends-the-92nd-annual-academy-awards-at-news-photo-1616006316.?crop=0.777xw:1.00xh;0.112xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/billie-eilish-attends-the-92nd-annual-academy-awards-at-news-photo-1616006316.?crop=0.777xw:1.00xh;0.112xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="92nd Annual Academy Awards - Arrivals"/>

     <div class="feed-block feed-block-big-story-feed" data-block-template="big-story-feed">
      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Culture
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="featured-item" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="4684e307-46cc-4e30-ab01-d9e54fa237f3" data-vars-block-slot="6" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Feed Block">
        <div class="custom-item gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-interview column-right">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image" data-vars-cta="Culture" data-vars-position="1" href="/culture/books/a35809336/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-interview/">
           <picture class="">
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-1616027294.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=1120:*" media="(min-width: 73.75rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-1616027294.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=1024:*" media="(min-width: 64rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-1616027294.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 61.25rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-1616027294.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=720:*" media="(min-width: 40.625rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-1616027294.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=650:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-1616027294.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=480:*" media="(min-width: 20rem)"/>
            <img alt="of women and salt" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-1616027294.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=320:*" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Culture" data-vars-position="1" href="/culture/books/a35809336/gabriela-garcia-of-women-and-salt-interview/">
            Gabriela Garcia on
            <i>
             Of Women and Salt
            </i>
            and the Stories We Tell Ourselves
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

     <div class="feed-block feed-block-big-story-feed" data-block-template="big-story-feed">
      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Features
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="featured-item" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="9f448ef5-7abe-4744-84bd-24cd2f06968d" data-vars-block-slot="9" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Feed Block">
        <div class="custom-item maine-superspreader-wedding column-right">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image" data-vars-cta="Features" data-vars-position="1" href="/life-love/a35795998/maine-superspreader-wedding/">
           <picture class="">
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/elm030121ppmaine-wedding001-1615391471.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.410xh;0,0.0262xh&amp;resize=1120:*" media="(min-width: 73.75rem)"/>

     <div class="feed-block feed-block-default feed-block-page-content feed-block-4-across" data-block-template="default">
      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Latest
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Site" data-vars-block-id="a21ba185-a799-42e0-bf97-ab1b11308da5" data-vars-block-slot="12" data-vars-block-type="Page Content Block">
        <div class="custom-item sandra-oh-aapi-rally-pittsburgh-speech">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Latest" data-vars-position="1" href="/culture/celebrities/a35894916/sandra-oh-aapi-rally-pittsburgh-speech/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/sandra-oh-attends-the-vanity-fair-oscar-party-at-wallis-news-photo-1616341756.?crop=0.671xw:1.00xh;0.175xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>

        <div class="custom-item britney-spears-considering-speaking-out-soon">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Latest" data-vars-position="11" href="/culture/celebrities/a35886886/britney-spears-considering-speaking-out-soon/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/britney-spears-news-photo-1616091334.?crop=1.00xw:0.604xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/elle/assets/css/homepage.e2bdd66.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/elle/assets/css/homepage-mobile.e5db12a.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>

( function( d ) {
	const search = window.location.search;
	const ua = navigator.userAgent;
	if (~search.indexOf('disableTagManager') && (~ua.indexOf('Chrome-Lighthouse') || ~ua.indexOf('PTST')) ) return;
	const head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
	const s = document.createElement( "script" );
	s.async = true;

	
		window.GDPR_CONSENT_MODAL = function() {
				let oneTrustModalIsShowing = d.querySelector('#onetrust-banner-sdk') ? true : false;
		return oneTrustModalIsShowing;
	};

			s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag/Bootstrap.js";
			
	if ( d.cookie.indexOf( "nsghtn=dev" ) > -1 ) {
		s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-dev/Bootstrap.js";
	}

			head.appendChild( s );
	} )( document );
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
